amount.body1: Your transaction is secure, encrypted and directly goes to the owner for sustaining their business.
amount.body2: Please select or enter an amount.
amount.feesTooltip: Credit card processing fees are added in order to help our small businesses get your full donation.

waystodonate.friendofafriend-studioxscl: FRIEND OF A FRIEND STUDIO X SCL

buyMeal.subheader: Send Chinatown Love will connect merchants with local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to a community in need.
buyMeal.prompt: Please enter how many meals to gift
buyMeal.explanationFirst: By gifting a meal, your donation will still go directly to the merchant.
buyMeal.explanationSecond: Our partners will then distribute vouchers with those who can benefit the most from a free meal.

body.header: Sorry Your Dumpling Was Not Found
body.subHeader1: The page you are trying does not exist or has been moved.
body.subHeader2: Please try going back to the homepage.

merchantsPage.platformInfoDescription: We are providing an online platform to low-tech, cash-only, Asian-owned small businesses that have been disproportionately impacted by COVID-19.
merchantsPage.platformInfoAction: Support local merchants by making a donation or purchasing a voucher from them.
merchantsPage.flyerAsk: Know of any business owners that fit our target merchant?
merchantsPage.flyerDownload: Download our flyer to share with them.

disclaimer.donation: By proceeding with your transaction, you understand that you are making a donation to {{sellerName}}. No goods or services were exchanged for this donation.
disclaimer.donation_pool: By proceeding with your transaction, you understand that you are making a donation to all merchants partnered with Send Chinatown Love Inc. The full donation pool will be split among these merchants. No goods or services were exchanged for this donation.
disclaimer.gift_card: By proceeding with your purchase, you understand that the voucher card is not redeemable for cash and can only be used at {{sellerName}}. All purchases are final. In the event that the merchant is no longer open at the time of redemption, Send Chinatown Love Inc. will not be able to refund your purchase. Balance displayed in the voucher may or may not represent the final balance. Final balance information is subject to {{sellerName}} most recent records.

body.paymentInfo: Please add your payment information below
body.emailUpdates: I'd like to receive email updates from Send Chinatown Love, such as when the merchant receives my donation/purchase or when a new merchant is onboarded

donationPool.header: Checked out our merchants but not sure who to donate to first?
donationPool.description1: You can support by donating to our donation pool!
donationPool.description2: All donations will be distributed evenly to our merchants.

contributionBar.footer: 100% of all proceeds go to the businesses.

descriptionBox.bullet2: Not fluent in English, run cash-only establishments, and not tech-savvy
descriptionBox.bullet3: Currently struggling to pay rent, utility bills and employee wages
descriptionBox.bullet4: Do not have websites, online delivery services, or vouchers available
descriptionBox.bullet5: Located in NYC Manhattan Chinatown, Flushing, or Bensonhurst

donationBox.header: Not sure who to donate to?
donationBox.description: To support every merchant on this page, contribute to our donation pool. We distribute funds evenly across all businesses.

gamBox.description: Double the impact of your donation by gifting meals from our merchants to local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to our community in need.

gamHome.description: Double the impact of your donation by gifting meals from our merchants to local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to our community in need.

subheading.step2Text: Vouchers are created to be redeemed as meals
subheading.step3Text: Vouchers are donated to our community partners
subheading.step4Text: Partners distribute to individuals in need

noCampaignsBox.CTA: No active campaigns? You can still donate!
noCampaignsBox.description: Meal donations here will automatically be applied to our next campaign.

videoBox.caption: Watch how we bring impact to our communities through Gift-a-Meal.

listItem.fiscalSponsor: Donations for this campaign are in partnership with {{sponsorName}}, a non-profit organization under IRS code 501(c)(3). Your donation will be tax deductible to the extent allowable by law.

description.andRestaurants: and restaurants who have been impacted by COVID-19 to gift meals to communities in need.

lyftReward.mainBody1: Thanks for participating in the Send Chinatown Love Food Crawl!
lyftReward.mainBody2: In partnership with Lyft, we are giving away free Citi Bike Day Passes to help you get around Chinatown.
lyftReward.mainBody3: Would you like a free Citi Bike Day Pass?
lyftReward.successBody2: Please check your email for your Citi Bike Day Pass code!
lyftReward.failureBody2: It looks like we ran out of the Citi Bike Day Pass codes. Stay tuned for more giveaways in the future!
lyftReward.codeTitle: Here is your Free Lyft Citi Bike Day Pass code

lightUpChinatown.headerSubtext: Let’s light up Chinatown, one lantern at a time.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody1: Now that outdoor dining is extended year round, we want Chinatown streets to be amply lit for diners and residents.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody2: Support the Light Up Chinatown project by contributing to <1>“Adopt-A-Lantern!”</1> In addition to light fixtures being installed, beautiful outdoor lanterns will be hung along Mott Street from Canal to Bayard to welcome patrons into our wonderful community, right in time for the holidays.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody3: Purchasing a lantern will act as a donation towards the Light Up Chinatown project and with your contributions, we can represent Chinatown to be the vibrant and NYC cultural icon it has always been. This project is so important to show Chinatown is open for business and together, we are on our way to recovery.
lightUpChinatown.summaryBody4: <2>Send Chinatown Love</2> along with <2>Pearl River Mart, 46 Mott St Bakery, CCBA, Chinese Chamber of Commerce</2> and <2>UDO</2> are partnering to raise funds to light up major blocks of Chinatown. We hope you will join us.
lightUpChinatown.phase2: Phase 2: Light up Bayard Street to Pell Street
lightUpChinatown.phase3: Phase 3: Light up the rest of Chinatown
lightUpChinatown.ceremony1: Our big reveal of “Light Up Chinatown” is planned for the second week of December in celebration of the Winter Solstice. We hope you and your family will join us for this festive evening. Together, we can find light in the darkness.
lightUpChinatown.ceremony2: When you make a lantern donation, you will receive an email once we finalize the date and time.
